column1: Uchi////5.) Fried Milk - This dessert is the cherry on top at Uchi.  After a long
column3: the best way to close out is a serving of fried milk.  Complete with flaky
column4: toasted milk that melts as soon as you bite into it
column5: coupled with chocolate moose and iced milk sherbet
column6: this is a unique dessert that wraps up the perfect meal.
